title: Online Learning and Internet Information Utilization Strategies for Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of nursing and fundamental internet usage skills
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized instructional design considering PC-unavailable environments.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to evaluate reliable nursing-related online information using three or more criteria.
Learners will be able to search for evidence-based nursing practice materials in academic databases using only mobile devices.
Learners will be able to convert online health information suitable for patient education into two formats (infographics, videos).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
